activate.title: Activation
activate.successFlash: Activation was successful. You are now logged in.
alerts.add.title: Add alert
alerts.add.description: Monitoring and notification settings. Please choose between different types of alerts and notifications.
alerts.add.keywordDescription: Defintion of keywords. You'll only be notified if the changes containing one of the keywords.
alerts.add.option1: Multiple words on a line mean that all of them have to occur in the changed content.
alerts.add.option2: Mulitple rows mean that the occurence of any of these words will trigger an alert.
alerts.add.option3: When you put a group of words in quotes, the results will only include notifications with the same words in the same order as the ones inside the quotes.
alerts.add.option4: When you use a dash before a keyword, it excludes notifications with that keyword from your results.
alerts.add.alertDescription: You'll be notified as soon as there was change detected.
alerts.add.thresholdDescription: The threshold describes the proportion of the changes to the full page. You'll be notified as soon as there was change detected, which exceeds the selected threshold.
alerts.add.errorAlertType: Please choose a type of notification.
alerts.edit.title: Edit alert
alerts.edit.AskRemove: Do you really want to delete this alert?
alerts.edit.description: Monitoring and notification settings. Please choose between different types of alerts and notifications.
alerts.edit.keywordDescription: Defintion of keywords. You'll only be notified if the changes containing one of the keywords.
alerts.edit.option1: Multiple words on a line mean that all of them have to occur in the changed content.
alerts.edit.option2: Mulitple rows mean that the occurence of any of these words will trigger an alert.
alerts.edit.option3: When you put a group of words in quotes, the results will only include notifications with the same words in the same order as the ones inside the quotes.
alerts.edit.option4: When you use a dash before a keyword, it excludes notifications with that keyword from your results.
alerts.edit.alertDescription: You'll be notified as soon as there was change detected.
alerts.edit.thresholdDescription: The threshold describes the proportion of the changes to the full page. You'll be notified as soon as there was change detected, which exceeds the selected threshold.
alerts.edit.errorAlertType: Please choose a type of notification.
contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have any questions? Please fill in the following request form and we'll contact you as soon as possible.
contact.errorFlash: There was an error while sending your request.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
developer.title: Developer
developer.doc: This API documentation will help you to get a quick overview of our developer interface and documents all available methods in detail.
developer.text: Our REST API enables free access to all your data. Use your own application to define sites and alerts via the developer interface; and, of course, you can also fetch your results. Thus, you are able to use the service with whatever application you prefer.
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text1: The facts and data contained on this website are exclusively intended as information. The user shall bear all risk for their further use. Datahouse AG provides no guarantee for the data and information on this website, in particular for its availability, correctness, consistency, completeness and up-to-dateness. Datahouse AG reserves the right to remove or change the facts and data at any time without prior notification.
disclaimer.text2: Unless otherwise expressly indicated, Datahouse AG is exclusively entitled to the copyright for all products, samples, publications, etc. on this website. Redistribution or any other form of duplication or transmission of the website data is prohibited without the prior written consent of Datahouse AG. The data and information are the intellectual property of Datahouse AG and further use shall not be made thereof without the prior written consent of Datahouse AG.
disclaimer.text3: Transferring any credentials for this website to unauthorized third parties is strictly prohibited.
disclaimer.text4: The data provided by AWP and its partner may only be used for their own use. The data or excerpts thereof may not be copied in any form, be reproduced, distributed to unauthorized third parties, be accessible or stored by unauthorized third parties. All data will be developed with care. We assume no liability for delays, errors, mistakes and omissions.
disclaimer.text5: Within the reporting obligation of Datahouse to AWP your user data (name, first name, company name (optional)) is transmitted to AWP on a monthly basis.
favorite.title: Favorites
impressum.title: Imprint
login.title: Login
passwordRecovery.title: Reset password
passwordRecovery.successFlash: You'll receive an email containing further information
passwordReset.title: Set a new password and retype it.
passwordReset.errorPw1: Please enter your password. It must be at least 8 characters and has to contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
passwordReset.description: Set a new password and retype it in the second input field.
prices.title: Prices
product.title: Product
product.text1: Monitoor enables you to automatically detect modifications on websites. Filtering alerts by keywords makes sure you only get notified about relevant changes. Graphical reports help to get a quick overview and will get you started in creating significant analyses.
product.text2: Every URL can be added and monitored. You can use this to track your competitors, to be alerted about changes in public infrastructure, or to get notifications about political and social news all around the world. Monitoor can be used wherever access to up-to-date information is a key element for success.
product.text3: Different alert types will help you to only get relevant information. Access is also possible via mobile devices or for developers via a well-defined interface.
profile.title: Profile
profile.errorPw2: Please enter a new password. It must be at least 8 characters and has to contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
registration.title: Registration
registration.successFlash: Thank you for your registration. Soon you'll receive an email containing an activation link.
registration.description: Choose your subscription plan and start managing your data sources from the internet. See the pricing page for more details about the plans.
registration.app.description: Register your email address and start managing your data sources from the internet.
registration.errorEmailUnique: This email is already in use.
registration.errorPw1: Please enter a password. The password has to be at least 8 characters containg both uppercase and lowercase characters and at least one number.
share.title: Shared Change
subscribe.title: Subscribe channel
subscribe.description: Subscribe to any of these channels and stay up to date.
subscribe.infotext: * AWP financial news is a paid service of Monitoor. You can test the channel for 14 days. After the trial period, the contract will be automatically renewed and a monthly fee of CHF 40.- is due. The fee is always calculated per calendar month in the full amount, regardless of the subscription date. Please also note the information in the disclaimer.
subscribe.confirmtext: This channel is available at a charge. Would you like to activate it?
urls.add.title: Add page
urls.add.description: Please enter an URL of a website and an optional title. Choose the frequency of the monitoring and add the website to a group on which you'll define the notification during the next step.
urls.add.description_bookmarklet: You can also add a website via the bookmarklet. Drag the Monitoor button into the bookmark toolbar of your browser, then visit the site you want to add to Monitoor and click the button on the toolbar. The visited site will now be added and monitored.
urls.add.xpathInfo1: XPath allows you to select an area of a website that is to be monitored by Monitoor. Only the selected area will be monitored and not the whole page. This can be useful, for example if you only want to monitor the main content area of a news site.
urls.add.xpathInfo2: Open the Inspector in your browser, select the area you want to monitor and paste the XPath in the input field above. Browser add-ons such as FirePath for Firefox make it easy to find XPaths.
urls.edit.title: Edit page
urls.edit.description: Edit the definition and the properties of a website.
urlGroups.title: Manage pages
urlGroups.confirmRemoveUrl: Do you really want to deleted this URL?
urlGroups.confirmRemoveGroup: Do you really want to delete this group?
urlGroups.successFlashSaveGroup: The name of the group has been changed.
urlGroups.description: Organize the websites in groups and see your existing alerts. The type of monitoring and the notification for each group can be defined by clicking on the bell symbol.
dashboard.add.title: Add page
dashboard.demoDescription: These are sample data of some webpages. Start now and add your own pages to be monitored. The changes are then represented in the same way. You can add any URL or subscribe to predefined topics.
dashboard.addUrl.successFlash: The page has been added successfully. The properties may be changed using the Alerts link.
